mapper.insert: insert into wx_user_table (id, openid, username, contact, institute_id, grade, gender, birthday, studentid, wages) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{instituteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{grade,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{studentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wages,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update wx_user_table set openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, institute_id = #{instituteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, grade = #{grade,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, studentid = #{studentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wages = #{wages,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, openid, username, contact, institute_id, grade, gender, birthday, studentid, wages from wx_user_table where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, openid, username, contact, institute_id, grade, gender, birthday, studentid, wages from wx_user_table
